message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get the remaining 10%.
I'll give you a smaller share, but it's still a good deal. You can't do better than this!
I'm willing to compromise, but I won't accept a deal that's so heavily skewed in your favor. Let's split it more evenly this time.
I'll meet you in the middle, but I think I deserve a bit more since I'm taking on more risk by rejecting your previous offers.
